title: Dryer, Wheelchair Accessible, Clubhouse, Walk-In Closets
posting_body: 1827 West Gowan Road , North Las Vegas, NV, 89032
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1130 Sq.
Newport Village is located in North Las Vegas.
We offer 1 and 2 bedroom apartments for rent.

Amenities include gated access, fitness center, resort style pool and spa, playground, patio or balcony, private garages available, ceiling fans, microwaves, washer and dryer included, extra storage available and pets are welcome (up to 25 pounds)!
Take a virtual tour of our amazing property and get ready to call us home!
Pets Welcome up to 25 pounds (at mature weight).
Please contact our leasing department and one of our expert staff members will review the policies with you.
Please note we charge a $300 non-refundable pet fee and $25 per month pet rent.
